title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 608.5 - Excavation or placement of fill in navigable waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 608.5 - Excavation or placement of fill in navigable waters

State Regulations

Permit required. No person, local public corporation or
interstate authority may excavate from or place fill, either directly or
indirectly, in any of the navigable waters of the State or in marshes, estuaries, tidal marshes and wetlands that are adjacent to and contiguous at
any point to any of the navigable waters of the State, and that are inundated
at mean high water level or tide, without a permit issued pursuant to this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
608.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
